entry.title: Wrong files added in commit
entry.summary:
So this is what you have done - Added the wrong files to the staging area - Commited - Not push

What to do now? 1. Reset to the last commit

    git reset --soft HEAD~1
  1. Remove folders that you dont want
    git reset node_modules/

    1. Check status to see the added files in â€¦
entry.content:
So this is what you have done - Added the wrong files to the staging area - Commited - Not push

What to do now? 1. Reset to the last commit

    git reset --soft HEAD~1
  1. Remove folders that you dont want
    git reset node_modules/

    1. Check status to see the added files in the staging area

      git status 4. Make new commits

      git commit -m "Cleaning styles.css" 5. Push the commits

      git push -u origin master
